body.p:
Frankfort Ky
Aug 31st 1861
Col F. K. Hunt Esq
Lexington
Ky --

I ^have^ dispatched Genl Crittenden forthwith to Cynthiana with instructions to enquire into & report the facts to me, and if necessary to order out such force as he might deem properly for protection of the road --
